definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The reading on the meter is fifty-five yuan.
I am not sure , but whatever it is, it will show you on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把握，但不管是多少，計價器會顯示的。

sentences.english: You can read the kilometer on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在計價器上看到公里數。

sentences.english: Taximeter on the multi-function design, there are many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 是關於多功能出租車計價器的設計，有許多創新方面。

sentences.english: That way, they double their money—although only one fare registers on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，計價器上只顯示一名顧客，卻可以賺雙倍的錢。

sentences.english: In this paper, the importance of taximeter in our life is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了出租車計價器系統在實際生產生活中的重要性。

sentences.english: It is 45 yuan on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 我的計價器上顯示的是45元。

sentences.english: The reading on the meter is 24 yuan, Why is it one yuan more?
sentences.chinese: 計價器上顯示是24塊，爲什麼多了一塊錢？

sentences.english: Taxi-driver: We use meter here. The meter reads 38 yuan and 60 fen.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏使用計價器，計價器上顯示是38元6角。

sentences.english: Taxi-driver: We use meter here. The meter reads 38 yuan and 60 fen.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏使用計價器，計價器上顯示是38元6角。

sentences.english: If they do not turn on the meter get another cab.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們不打開計價器，那就再換個出租車。

sentences.english: This paper introduces program of designing the new-pattern Taximeter control circuit.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了新型出租車計價器控制電路的設計。

sentences.english: Probably around 8.00. Whatever the meter says.
sentences.chinese: 大約8美元，由計價器說了算。
